span.strong: WHY DO PARENTS LOVE JEFFERSON ACADEMY?

p.span: Jefferson Academy is a publicly funded elementary charter school in the classical tradition. In addition to an incredible faculty and outstanding test scores, Jefferson Academy offers:

li.span: Leveled classes for math and reading
Schoolwide Enrichment Model (SEM) pullouts for accelerated students
The study of American citizenship based on the Core Knowledge sequence

span.em: “Our children love being challenged and learning everyday. My husband and I love knowing that their teachers and staff truly care about their education and emotional well-being.” -Traci Wilcox

div.div: JA Sixth Grade Graduation. We are so proud of these students. They have had an incredible journey with us and we know they will do great . . .
